warnings.general: Exporting will save all ${this.menu.settings} and ${this.menu.shows}. On import all current ${this.menu.settings} and ${this.menu.shows} will be deleted!
warnings.restore: Restoring the defaults will remove all current trackers and custom settings! Your ${this.menu.shows} won't be affected.
